General.Name: Fabled Copper Corp
General.Description: Fabled Silver Gold Corp. focuses on acquiring precious metal properties in Mexico. It intends to acquire the Mecatona Property located in the Parral Silver Mining District. The company was formerly known as Fabled Copper Corp. and changed its name to Fabled Silver Gold Corp. in October 2020. Fabled Silver Gold Corp. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1500 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6G 2Z6
